nascent: Reporting standards have not been integrated yet.
emerging: The Impact Management Capability has identified reporting standards that are relevant for its operating context.
expanding: Relevant reporting standard(s) have been selected.
optimising: The selected reporting standard(s) are being executed to plan.
mature: Relevant reporting standard(s) are fully integrated across the organization.

emerging: The Impact Management Capability is in the process of selecting relevant standards.
expanding: The reporting framework has been adapted to accommodate the reporting standards.
optimising: Review is incorporated to improve measures.
mature: Reporting facilitates transparent communication of how the organization arrived at its conclusions.
